# <a name="action-confirmations"></a><span data-ttu-id="9a683-102">動作確認</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9a683-102">Action confirmations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9a683-103">如果您不小心移動或刪除郵件，您可以復原該巨集指令。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9a683-103">If you accidentally moved or deleted a message, you can undo that action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9a683-104">大約 5 秒螢幕底部會顯示 [復原] 對話方塊。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9a683-104">The undo dialog appears at the bottom of the screen for about 5 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9a683-105">選取 [**復原**]，即可取消移動或刪除動作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9a683-105">Select **Undo** to cancel the move or delete action.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9a683-106">您可以關閉此功能在[巨集指令確認](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)（切換</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9a683-106">You can switch off this feature in [Action confirmations](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="9a683-107">**設定** > **檢視所有的 Outlook 設定** > **一般** > **通知**)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9a683-107">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Notifications**).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9a683-108">附註： 之後已傳送的郵件，您無法復原該巨集指令。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9a683-108">Note: Once a message has been sent, you can't undo that action.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9a683-109">如需詳細資訊，請參閱[我想要回收 Outlook.com 中的郵件](https://support.office.com/article/c069ddde-5282-4085-8f4c-d7b133324f8a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9a683-109">For more information, see [I want to recall a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c069ddde-5282-4085-8f4c-d7b133324f8a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
